qdb
===

JSON file store.

New db or read existing
````
var mydb = require('qdb')(defaultobj, filename);
````

.use(function(val))
````
mydb.use(function(v){
	console.log('v:', v);
	return 'yo'
})
````

.set(name, value)
````
mydb.set('newperson', 'Alexsss');
````

.wipe()  Delete the file
````
mydb.wipe()
````
